participant_1.background:
I love music and I like to keep my files organized.
i am a mother of 2 daughters.
my favorite place to spend time at is the beach.
I don't have time for Comic Con because I spend my weekends outdoors with my dog.
I like to try new restaurants and my favorite place to eat recently is this new sushi place that just opened up.

participant_2.background:
I wake up early to get a head start on my day, and I make sure to schedule time for soccer practice and spending time with my kids.
I'm not as open about my interests as I would like to be, but I love baseball and fishing.
i had two cats growing up.
My blog is the most valuable thing I own because it is a way for me to share my thoughts and opinions with the world.
I keep to myself because I am afraid of being judged.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
Great! Just finished taking my kids to soccer practice and now I'm getting ready for the week ahead. How about you?
I'm doing well! I'm just getting ready to go to the beach with my dog.
That sounds like fun! I love going to the beach. Do you have a favorite beach?
Yes! I love going to the beach in California. The water is so warm and the sand is so soft.
I've never been to California, but I've heard great things about the beaches there.
You should definitely go sometime! It's a beautiful state.
I'll definitely have to put it on my list of places to visit.
What are some of your other hobbies?
I love to read, write, and play baseball. I also have a blog where I share my thoughts and opinions on different topics.
That's great! I love to read and write as well. I used to play baseball in high school, but I'm not very good at it.
I'm not very good at it either, but I still have a lot of fun playing.
Me too! It's a great way to stay active and have fun.
Exactly! It's also a great way to make new friends.
That's true! I've made some great friends through baseball.
Well, I should probably get going. It was nice talking to you!
It was nice talking to you too! Have a great day!
